title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM, embeddings and tool-calling pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper that adds conversation history, syntax highlighting and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models into inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with streaming, embeddings, and tool-calling support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for chatting, generating and embedding with Ollama over HTTP.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that lets users switch Ollama models mid-conversation and export chats.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for C# with async streaming, embeddings, and tool support for Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All-chat UI that can plug into Ollama endpoints for local model conversations.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run Ollama models on selected notes for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate on crates.io exposing Ollama chat, generate and embedding APIs.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Community SDK index maintained by Ollama team listing Go, Python, JS, Rust, C#, Java and more.

title: reddit/r/ollama
summary: Active subreddit for sharing Ollama models, tips, integrations and troubleshooting.
